title: Andy Grammer explains why he is 'insanely' excited about having another daughter
text:
CLOSE

Andy Grammer announced on Instagram that his wife Aijia is pregnant with their second child. (Photo: Charles Sykes, Charles Sykes/Invision/AP)

Singer and songwriter Andy Grammer is expecting another daughter, and he says that's "Fine by Me."

The "Keep Your Head Up" artist announced on Instagram that his wife, Aijia Lise, is pregnant with "another little girl" and that he is "INSANELY, WILDLY, HYPERVENTILATINGLY EXCITED ABOUT IT."

He wrote a lengthy caption about his growing family alongside a photo of him, his wife and their 2-year-old daughter, Louisiana. They are all dressed in '80s hair-band garb, and the poster reads, "New band member joins the tour 2020."

"There is quite literally NOTHING I want to invest my time and life in more then another little girl," Grammer continued, adding that he and Aijia are excited for "another opportunity to raise a strong, playful, empowered little lady."

He added two bullet points of what he loves about being a dad. First of all, "the love is so immense you couldn’t possibly experience it all," he wrote.

Secondly, he feels a "profound responsibility of being the door and representative of a whole gender to my little girl."

"Now girls," he clarified.

"A big part of making headway in the equality of men and women on this planet rests on the relationship of Fathers and Daughters. I look forward to trying to be a better example of men to both of them," he wrote.

He joked that his two daughters could be called "The Grammer Girls" and his house is going to have way too much estrogen, so "send help."

Aijia shared the photo on her Instagram and said it was hard to keep the news a secret.

Congratulations to the growing family and the soon-to-be big sister!
